Package org.scec.sha.magdist

Interface Summary
MagFreqDistAPI Title: MagFreqDistAPI
Description: This interface defines the common API that all MagFreqDistributions must provide.
 

Class Summary
DiscreteMagFreqDist Title: DiscreteMagFreqDist
Description: This abstract class represents the rate of earthquakes (per year) as a function of magnitude (not a cumulative distribution).
GaussianMagFreqDist Title: GaussMagFreqDist
Description: This is a subclass of MagFreqDist, where the distribution is represented with a truncated Gaussian distribution.
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:
GR_MagFreqDist Title: GR_MagFreqDist
Description: This is a subclass of MagFreqDist, where the distribution is Gutenberg Richter
Note: Any changes to magLower and magUpper must fall within the bounds of minX and maxX, and must be closer than the tolerance to one of the x-values.
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:
SingleMagFreqDist Title: SingleMagFreqDist
Description: This is a subclass of MagFreqDist where only one discrete magnitude value (Mag) has a nonzero Rate.
SummedMagFreqDist Title: SummedMagFreqDist
Description: This will sum up the rates of a bunch of different DiscreteMagFreqDist objects (e.g., to produce what will get passed back by EarthquakeSource.getMagFreqDist())
Methods: add(descretMagFreqDist) subtract(descretMagFreqDist)
Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001
Company:
